name: FNaF VBS
description:
FNaF VBS

Imagine FNaF, but with no graphics, no audio, barely any gameplay elements, and less compatibility.

All "jokes" aside, this is really just a 10 minute game. It shares the same game elements with FNaF, just adapted to Visual Basic Script.

The next FNaF VBS game I'm gonna make is UCN. A demo should be available.

See you then!
